screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ove file in Sonic Scores Overture
screenshot.caption: OVE file open in Sonic Scores Overture

description: Professional composers, music teachers, and music students use Overture to create, edit, and publish musical scores. Because Overture allows composers to play scores in time with video, it is especially popular among film score composers.

Prior to version 5, Overture saved composers' scores as OVE files. In version 5, Sonic Scores replaced the OVE format with the .OVEX format. However, current versions of Overture can still open OVE files.
NOTE: Sonic Scores was previously known as GenieSoft.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ove file in Sonic Scores Overture
images.caption: OVE file open in Sonic Scores Overture
